activities: C9 provides a data warehouse, analytic applications and analytic reports accessible over the internet by its customers' users. C9 provides secure data access and protection from unauthorized access for all customer data that it stores in the customer data warehouses.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
